title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.1 - Application

State Regulations

An application for a determination that an aircraft acquired after the effective date of section 1301(a)(19) and after the effective date of this Part by a domestic or foreign insurer or United States branch of an alien insurer be allowed as an admitted asset shall be filed with the superintendent for prior written approval that such acquisition is in compliance with the standards promulgated by this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
85.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
